addChoice(String, StoryFragment, int) - Static method in class com.team08storyapp.StoryController
Allows for an Author's creation of a Choice to be added to the Story Fragment they are working on.
addOfflineStory(Story) - Method in class com.team08storyapp.FileHelper
Create a file named after the story's Id (since it's unique), and write the story content into the file.
addOrUpdateOnlineStory(Story) - Method in class com.team08storyapp.ESHelper
Adds or updates a story on the webservice.
addPic(int, Bitmap) - Method in class com.team08storyapp.PicAdapter
addPic method is a helper method to add a bitmap to the gallery when the user chooses one
addStoryFragment(StoryFragment, Story) - Static method in class com.team08storyapp.StoryController
Allows for an Authors creation of a StoryFragment to be added to the Story they are working on.
annoImage - Variable in class com.team08storyapp.AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder
 
Annotation - Class in com.team08storyapp
Annotation is a model class representing a reader's Annotations on a Particular Story Fragment.
Annotation() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.Annotation
The default constructor for creating an Annotation object.
AnnotationAdapter - Class in com.team08storyapp
AnnotationAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter that is designed for populating the images and text (if applicable) into right views in a ListView.
AnnotationAdapter(Activity, int, ArrayList<Annotation>) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.AnnotationAdapter
The constructor of an AnnotationAdapter requires at least a list of annotation as the information provider and an activity to get LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE.
AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder - Class in com.team08storyapp
ViewHolder is a like a struct in C++.
AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder
 
AnnotationController - Class in com.team08storyapp
AnnotationController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving annotations and update the current story and current story fragment.
AnnotationController(Activity, Story, StoryFragment, int, FileHelper, ESHelper) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.AnnotationController
Constructor of the AnnotationController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.
AnnotationViewActivity - Class in com.team08storyapp
AnnotationViewActivity is a view class that displays a list of annotations for a specific story fragment.
AnnotationViewActivity() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.AnnotationViewActivity
 
appendUpdateQueue(int, Context) - Static method in class com.team08storyapp.UpdateFileRecorder
appendUpdateQueue function is called whenever a local authored story has been changed since last sync.
Audio - Class in com.team08storyapp
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Audio is a model class representing an soundtrack or recording that can be used in an Annotation on a StoryFragment in a Story or as an illustration on a StoryFragment in a Story.
Audio() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.Audio
++++++ Used for future implementation ++++++ Fake constructor for creating an Audio object.
